xxl.cursors
Class DivideAndConquer

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--xxl.cursors.AbstractCursor
        |
        +--xxl.cursors.DivideAndConquer
public class DivideAndConquer
extends AbstractCursor

Divide&Conquer paradigm. This class creates a "Conquerer" for each element of a given "Divider". The results of different Conquerers are serialized, i.e. the elements of DivideAndConquer are already the results of the computation. TODO: Current work

See Also:
Divider
